CustomField.description: If this Event is a 'sub-event' of a larger Event, such as for a large college reunion or a multi-day event, where each sub-event requires its own registration and each sub-event has multiple sessions.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this Event is a 'sub-event' of a larger Event, such as for a large college reunion or a multi-day event, where each sub-event requires its own registration and each sub-event has multiple sessions.
CustomField.label: Parent Event
